hook.text: The deal must close by month-end. The seller knows. They slow-walk every concession.

buildup.text: Deadlines are the silent killer in negotiations. The side under pressure blinks first.

discovery.text: Eighty percent of concessions happen in the last 20% of a negotiation's clock. Patience pays.

twist.text: Fake deadlines get exposed. If you say 'final offer Friday' and call again Monday, credibility dies.

climax.text: Guard your own deadlines ruthlessly. Never reveal them unless time pressure helps your position.

punchline.text: Deadlines decide deals. Guard yours carefully.

quiz.question: What happens if you reveal a fake deadline?
